name: Helpchat
body:
## What is HelpChat?

Help chat is a plugin aimed towards helping users grab the attention of online admins.

## How do I install and set-up HelpChat?

To install HelpChat all you need to do is drop it in your bukkit plugins folder and reload/restart your server.
There is no configuration file for this at time but i might ad an option on customising the commands and the colour of the chat messages.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
